item.title: Test R Post
item.author: contact@alexaxthelm.com (Alex Axthelm)
item.description: This is some plain text. library(ggplot2) myplot <- ggplot2::ggplot( data = mtcars, mapping = ggplot2::aes( x = wt, y = mpg, color = factor(cyl) ) ) + ggplot2::geom_point() + ggplot2::theme_minimal() + ggplot2::labs( title = "A scatterplot of mtcars", subtitle = "Look, plotting works!" ) myplot
